subtitle: These little potatoes are tasty and look attractive too.

method.text: Heat enough oil in a roasting pan to just cover the base. Heat in the oven for 3 min until hot.
Add the potatoes to the pan. Stir to coat well in the oil. Season liberally. Roast in the oven for 30 min.
Remove from oven. Stir thoroughly. Sprinkle over the sesame seeds. Return to the oven and cook for 15-20 min until crisp and tender.

title: Sesame roasted new potatoes
